filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E19 - Flesh and Blood.mkv
title: Flesh and Blood
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E19 - Flesh and Blood.mkv
description: Elias is finally ready to eliminate the dons and become the leader of the underground.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E18 - Identity Crisis.mkv
title: Identity Crisis
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E18 - Identity Crisis.mkv
description: Finch and Mr. Reese are going after a person who seems to be leading a double life. However, they soon realize there are 2 people with the same social security number; one of whom is in danger and one who's an impostor.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E17 - Baby Blue.mkv
title: Baby Blue
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E17 - Baby Blue.mkv
description: When Moretti gets released from prison, Carter and Mr. Reese team up to protect him from Elias. Meanwhile, Finch's new number belongs to a six month old baby girl.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E16 - Risk.mkv
title: Risk
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E16 - Risk.mkv
description: The Machine leads Reese and Finch to Wall Street when a sharp young trader at a major investment bank becomes embroiled in a multi-million dollar financial scam.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E15 - Blue Code.mkv
title: Blue Code
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E15 - Blue Code.mkv
description: Reese discovers there's more to the story after he infiltrates a smuggling ring to get close to his latest POI.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E14 - Wolf and Cub.mkv
title: Wolf and Cub
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E14 - Wolf and Cub.mkv
description: The Machine identifies Darren, a teenager whose brother was just murdered, as the next POI. Meanwhile, Finch is growing concerned that the son of his former business partner is dangerously close to finding out about The Machine.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E11 - Super.mkv
title: Super
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E11 - Super.mkv
description: Reese works the computer while Finch does the legwork with their latest POI, a building super who keeps too close an eye on his tenants. Meanwhile, Detective Carter may finally get her long-awaited glimpse into a case.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E12 - Legacy.mkv
title: Legacy
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E12 - Legacy.mkv
description: When Carter finally comes face-to-face with Reese, he urges her to join forces to help with their latest POI, a scrappy young woman from the wrong side of the tracks who turned her life around and became a lawyer.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E13 - Root Cause.mkv
title: Root Cause
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E13 - Root Cause.mkv
description: Finch and Reese run surveillance on a man who's been unemployed for eight months without his family knowing. Angry that he's been fired, he may pose a threat to society.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E09 - Get Carter.mkv
title: Get Carter
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E09 - Get Carter.mkv
description: Reese and Finch's game of cat and mouse with Detective Carter becomes infinitely more complicated when The Machine declares that she is their newest POI.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E10 - Number Crunch.mkv
title: Number Crunch
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E10 - Number Crunch.mkv
description: As Detective Carter deals with the fallout from her recent encounter with Reese and Finch, The Machine ups the ante for the duo by giving them four Social Security numbers instead of one.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E07 - Witness.mkv
title: Witness
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E07 - Witness.mkv
description: The Machine identifies a school teacher who witnessed a mob hit as their next POI and Reese and Finch rush to save his life.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E08 - Foe.mkv
title: Foe
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E08 - Foe.mkv
description: When Reese and Finch discover that their latest POI has connections to Cold War Soviet espionage circles, they quickly learn how covert ops were handled in a world before The Machine.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E06 - The Fix.mkv
title: The Fix
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E06 - The Fix.mkv
description: Mr. Reese goes as the new driver of fixer Zoe Morgan in order to decide if she's a victim or perpetrator. When Zoe listens to a recording she isn't supposed to, she becomes the target of a pharmaceutical company.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E05 - Judgement.mkv
title: Judgement
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E05 - Judgement.mkv
description: When the Machine produces the social security number of a judge renowned for his tough sentencing, Reese and Finch have the added challenge of investigating a POI who wants nothing to do with their brand of vigilante justice.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E04 - Cura Te Ipsum.mkv
title: Cura Te Ipsum
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E04 - Cura Te Ipsum.mkv
description: Reese and Finch surveil their latest POI, Dr. Megan Tillman, while she's on call and after hours to unravel the threat surrounding the promising young physician.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E03 - Mission Creep.mkv
title: Mission Creep
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E03 - Mission Creep.mkv
description: The latest number is an ex-soldier who's now part of a gang that specialize in robberies. Mr. Reese goes undercover, infiltrating the gang. This triggers memories of Jessica.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E02 - Ghosts.mkv
title: Ghosts
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E02 - Ghosts.mkv
description: Reese and Finch are given the Social Security number of a teenager killed two years ago, questioning the infallibility of the Machine; Finch flashes back to the Machine's origin, and how it was developed.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E01 - Pilot.mkv
title: Pilot
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E01 - Pilot.mkv
description: When the social security number of a young prosecutor comes up, Reese and Finch work together to figure out if their person of interest is the victim or perpetrator.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E20 - Matsya Nyaya.mkv
title: Matsya Nyaya
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E20 - Matsya Nyaya.mkv
description: In 2012, Mr. Reese goes undercover as an armored car security guard to prevent a robbery. In 2010, CIA plan to eliminate two of their best agents.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E23 - Firewall.mkv
title: Firewall
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E23 - Firewall.mkv
description: Reese is trapped next to a person of interest in a part of the city extremely controlled and needs the help of Finch, Fusco and Carter.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E22 - No Good Deed.mkv
title: No Good Deed
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E22 - No Good Deed.mkv
description: Finch and Mr. Reese are tailing a spy working for the NSA. As he gets too close to finding out about the Machine, the Government are out to get him.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E21 - Many Happy Returns.mkv
title: Many Happy Returns
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E21 - Many Happy Returns.mkv
description: Finch gives Reese the day off ostensibly as a favor but really because the new number is too close to John. He finds out anyway, leading to the question of how far he will go to protect.
